mapper.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_status, member_mid, live_id, alarm_time) values (#{alarm_status}, #{member_mid}, #{live_id}, to_date(#{alarm_time}, 'yy/mm/dd HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET ALARM_STATUS = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ALARM_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(current_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') THEN 1 WHEN TO_CHAR(ALARM_TIME,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < TO_CHAR(current_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') THEN 2 ELSE 0 END
mapper.select: select m.mid, m.mtel from member m join alarm a on m.mid = a.member_mid where a.alarm_status = 1
